segment.source: Restoring Application and Windows Settings Synchronized with UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Restoring Application and Windows Settings Synchronized with UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Restoring Application and Windows Settings Synchronized with UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Restoring Application and Windows Settings Synchronized with UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Restoring Application and Windows Settings Synchronized with UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Restoring Application and Windows Settings Synchronized with UE-V 1.0

segment.source: WMI and PowerShell features of Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) provide the ability to restore settings packages.
segment.target: WMI and PowerShell features of Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) provide the ability to restore settings packages.

segment.source: WMI and PowerShell commands allow you to restore application and Windows settings to the settings values that were on the computer the first time the application launched after the UE-V Agent was installed.
segment.target: WMI and PowerShell commands allow you to restore application and Windows settings to the settings values that were on the computer the first time the application launched after the UE-V Agent was installed.

segment.source: This restoring action is performed on a per-application or Windows settings basis.
segment.target: This restoring action is performed on a per-application or Windows settings basis.

segment.source: The settings are restored the next time that the application is run or when the user logs on to the operating system.
segment.target: The settings are restored the next time that the application is run or when the user logs on to the operating system.

segment.source: To restore application settings and Windows settings with PowerShell
segment.target: To restore application settings and Windows settings with PowerShell

segment.source: Open the Windows PowerShell window.
segment.target: Open the Windows PowerShell window.

segment.source: To import the Microsoft UE-V PowerShell module, enter the following command:
segment.target: To import the Microsoft UE-V PowerShell module, enter the following command:

segment.source: Enter the following PowerShell cmdlet to restore the application settings and Windows settings.
segment.target: Enter the following PowerShell cmdlet to restore the application settings and Windows settings.

segment.source: PowerShell cmdlet
segment.target: PowerShell cmdlet

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Restore-UevUserSetting
segment.target: Restore-UevUserSetting

segment.source: Restores the user settings for an application or restores a group of Windows settings
segment.target: Restores the user settings for an application or restores a group of Windows settings

segment.source: To restore application settings and Windows settings with WMI
segment.target: To restore application settings and Windows settings with WMI

segment.source: Open a PowerShell window.
segment.target: Open a PowerShell window.

segment.source: Enter the following WMI command to restore application settings and Windows settings.
segment.target: Enter the following WMI command to restore application settings and Windows settings.

segment.source: WMI command
segment.target: WMI command

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class UserSettings -Name RestoreByTemplateId -ArgumentList template_ID
segment.target: Invoke-WmiMethod -Namespace root\Microsoft\UEV -Class UserSettings -Name RestoreByTemplateId -ArgumentList template_ID

segment.source: Restores the user settings for an application or restores a group of Windows settings
segment.target: Restores the user settings for an application or restores a group of Windows settings

segment.target: Related topics
